  • Constructor Details

    • Tile_HousingUnit

      public Tile_HousingUnit(int id, List<Type_side_connector> connectorList, SSTTypes types)
      Constructor for the Tile_HousingUnit class.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the housing unit tile.
      connectorList - A list of connectors associated with the tile, defined by the Type_side_connector enumeration.
      types - The type of the housing unit tile, based on the SSTTypes enumeration.

  • Method Details

    • addPassengerTileHousing

      public void addPassengerTileHousing()
      Increments the number of passengers in this Tile_HousingUnit. This method updates the internal counter for passengers, reflecting an increase of one unit in the total number of passengers.

    • getNumPassengers

      public int getNumPassengers()
      Retrieves the number of passengers currently present in the housing unit.
      Overrides:
      getNumPassengers in class SpaceShipTile
      Returns:
      the number of passengers as an integer

    • getIsThereAlien

      public boolean getIsThereAlien()
      Determines whether there is an alien present in the housing unit.
      Overrides:
      getIsThereAlien in class SpaceShipTile
      Returns:
      true if there is an alien present; false otherwise.

    • setIsThereAlien

      public void setIsThereAlien(boolean isThereAlien)
      Sets the presence of an alien in the housing unit.
      Overrides:
      setIsThereAlien in class SpaceShipTile
      Parameters:
      isThereAlien - a boolean value indicating whether there is an alien in the housing unit (true if an alien is present, false if not).

    • setNumPassengers

      public void setNumPassengers(int numPassengers)
      Sets the number of passengers for the housing unit.
      Parameters:
      numPassengers - the number of passengers to be set

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger() throws Exception
      Adds a passenger to the housing unit tile.

      If the current number of passengers exceeds the allowed number (1), prevents the addition of more passengers and triggers an event to notify the player through the EventBus. Otherwise, increments the passenger count.

      Overrides:
      addPassenger in class SpaceShipTile
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs in notifying the player via the EventBus.

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(int numPass) throws Exception
      Removes a specified number of passengers from the housing unit. This method prioritizes removing human passengers first, and if necessary, it will remove an Alien if present.
      Overrides:
      removePassenger in class SpaceShipTile
      Parameters:
      numPass - the number of passengers to be removed. If the number exceeds the available human passengers, any remaining amount will attempt to remove an Alien if one is present.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the removal process or if the requested removal exceeds the possible amount.

    • removeAlien

      public void removeAlien() throws Exception
      Removes the alien from the current tile if one is present. Updates the state of the tile and notifies the game system if the removal is attempted without an alien being present.
      Overrides:
      removeAlien in class SpaceShipTile
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error with the event notification or game system processing.

      If no alien is present on the tile, a warning is logged, and the game system's event bus is notified of the invalid action. If an alien is present, it is removed by setting the `isThereAlien` flag to false and resetting the `alienColor` to null.

    • addAlien

      public void addAlien(boolean wantAlien, AlienColor color, int row, int column) throws Exception
      Attempts to add an alien of the specified color to the given tile position on the spaceship. The process will verify specific conditions such as the availability of a life-support module of the matching color, and whether there are passengers or existing aliens of the same color that conflict with the addition.
      Overrides:
      addAlien in class SpaceShipTile
      Parameters:
      wantAlien - a boolean indicating whether the addition of the alien is desired
      color - the color of the alien to be added (e.g., VIOLET, BROWN)
      row - the row position on the spaceship tile matrix where the alien should be placed
      column - the column position on the spaceship tile matrix where the alien should be placed
      Throws:
      Exception - if the insertion process fails because conditions are not met or other unexpected errors occur

    • getAlienColor

      public AlienColor getAlienColor()
      Retrieves the color of the alien associated with this Tile_HousingUnit.
      Overrides:
      getAlienColor in class SpaceShipTile
      Returns:
      the AlienColor of the alien, which can be VIOLET or BROWN.

    • setAlienColor

      public void setAlienColor(AlienColor alienColor)
      Sets the color of the alien for this tile.
      Overrides:
      setAlienColor in class SpaceShipTile
      Parameters:
      alienColor - the color to assign to the alien. It should be one of the predefined values in AlienColor.
